title: remove the frame from my account
body: Where do I request to remove the frame from my account

replies.body: *DTN* is 100% correct here. Reach out in a support ticket and one of our specialists will be happy to assist you with this request. ^.^

Submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they can help you out there! You can reach that at any time by clicking **Support** on the top of this page, logging into the support site and clicking **Submit a Request**.
